name: Democracy 4
description: A political simulation game where you play as the president or prime minister of a country and make decisions to influence various policies.

name: The Political Machine 2020
description: A political campaign simulation game where players compete against each other to win a presidential election.

name: Power & Revolution, Geopolitical Simulator 4
description: A comprehensive geopolitical simulator where you control all aspects of a country's governance.

name: Twilight Struggle
description: A tabletop game that simulates the Cold War, where players compete against each other using a point system to determine the winner.

name: 1960: The Making of the President
description: A tabletop game where players compete in the 1960 U.S. Presidential election, with a point system determining the winner.

name: Crusader Kings III
description: A grand strategy game where you control a medieval dynasty over hundreds of years, with decisions leading to a variety of narrative outcomes.

name: Civilization VI
description: A turn-based strategy game where you guide a civilization from prehistoric times into the future, with decisions shaping the game's outcome.

name: The Banner Saga Trilogy
description: A tactical role-playing game series where your decisions significantly impact the narrative and outcomes.

name: Tropico 6
description: A simulation game where you play as the leader of a Caribbean island nation, making decisions about city planning, diplomacy, and more.

name: Hearts of Iron IV
description: A grand strategy game set in the lead-up to and during World War II, where as the leader of a nation you can steer the course of history in a different direction.

name: Europa Universalis IV
description: A grand strategy game that covers a period from the Late Middle Ages to the early modern period, where players control a nation and make decisions to shape historical outcomes.

name: Assassin's Creed series
description: An action-adventure series that often revolves around major historical events and periods, providing alternate outcomes to real historical events.

name: AltHistory
description: A text-based game that allows players to control a country and make decisions that can lead to alternate outcomes of real historical events.
